resources.string:
Smart Wi-Fi Attendance is an innovative classroom management system that automates student attendance tracking using Wi-Fi presence detection. The app eliminates manual roll calls and provides real-time attendance data for faculty and students.

Key Features:
- Wi-Fi based automatic attendance detection
- Real-time attendance tracking and reporting
- Student enrollment and MAC address management
- Faculty dashboard for session management
- Secure Firebase authentication and data storage
- Support for multiple branches, divisions, and groups
- Export attendance reports for record keeping

How it Works:
Students connect to the classroom Wi-Fi network, and the app automatically detects their presence using their device's MAC address. Faculty can start attendance sessions, and students are marked present when connected to the designated network.
Developed by: Manish Raj, Harsh Sharma, and Nilesh
